skills.name: Multi-Tenancy Concept
skills.pattern: Multiple customers on same system, isolated data

skills.name: Tenant
skills.pattern: Organization, account, workspace - logical separation

skills.name: Why Multi-Tenant
skills.pattern: Cost efficiency, easier maintenance, shared resources

skills.name: Isolation Levels
skills.pattern: Shared everything, shared DB, separate DBs, separate infra

skills.name: Shared Database
skills.pattern: tenant_id column on every table, filter all queries

skills.name: Schema Per Tenant
skills.pattern: Each tenant has own schema, same database

skills.name: Database Per Tenant
skills.pattern: Each tenant has own database, strong isolation

skills.name: Tenant Identification
skills.pattern: Subdomain, path, header, JWT claim

skills.name: Subdomain Tenancy
skills.pattern: Extract from host, wildcard DNS, SSL wildcards

skills.name: Path-Based Tenancy
skills.pattern: app.com/tenant-slug/resource, routing prefix

skills.name: Data Isolation
skills.pattern: Always filter by tenant, middleware enforcement

skills.name: Row-Level Security
skills.pattern: PostgreSQL RLS, automatic tenant filtering

skills.name: Tenant Context
skills.pattern: Middleware sets tenant, available throughout request

skills.name: Cross-Tenant Queries
skills.pattern: Super-admin queries all, tenant admins own data

skills.name: Tenant-Aware Auth
skills.pattern: User belongs to tenant(s), tenant in token

skills.name: User Switching
skills.pattern: User can belong to multiple tenants, switch context

skills.name: Tenant Invitations
skills.pattern: Invite by email, join tenant, roles per tenant

skills.name: Tenant Configuration
skills.pattern: Features, limits, branding stored per tenant

skills.name: White Labeling
skills.pattern: Logo, colors, custom domain, email from address

skills.name: Feature Flags
skills.pattern: Enable features per tenant, tiered plans

skills.name: Noisy Neighbor
skills.pattern: One tenant affects others, rate limiting, isolation

skills.name: Tenant Sharding
skills.pattern: Shard large tenants, route to specific infrastructure

skills.name: Resource Limits
skills.pattern: Per-tenant rate limits, storage quotas, user limits

skills.name: Tenant Billing
skills.pattern: Usage tracking, subscription tiers, Stripe

skills.name: Usage Metering
skills.pattern: API calls, storage, users, bandwidth per tenant

skills.name: Tenant Provisioning
skills.pattern: Create tenant, seed data, configure, notify

skills.name: Tenant Offboarding
skills.pattern: Data export, grace period, deletion, legal retention

skills.name: Data Export
skills.pattern: Export all tenant data, GDPR portability

skills.name: Multi-Tenant Testing
skills.pattern: Test tenant switching, cross-tenant access denied

skills.name: SaaS Patterns
skills.pattern: Consistent tenant context, audit logging, monitoring
